item.title: About me
item.description:
Iâ€™m Alessio Cassieri, a passionate developer and tech enthusiast with a keen interest in cybersecurity. I hold a degree in Computer Science from the University of Perugia. I enjoy building applications and exploring new technologies. This site serves as a portfolio of my work and a place where I share my projects and experiences.

Get in Touch

You can contact me via email or connect with me on LinkedIn.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
SoundClaudio

SoundClaudio is a replica of SoundCloud, developed for educational, learning and demonstration only purposes. This project demonstrates how to build a music-sharing platform using modern web technologies. It simulates essential features of SoundCloud, such as user registration or login, music uploading, save songs inside liked playlist and streaming music.

Technology

  • Angular
  • Bootstrap
  • NodeJS with Express
  • REST api
  • MySQL
  • JWT

Github

TAP & APD

TAP & APD is an e-commerce website for managing and selling tortellini. There are 2 types of service users:
